name: The Sum of Us
summary_text: A widowed father has to deal with two complex issues: while he is searching for "Miss Right," his son, who is in his 20s and gay, is searching for "Mr. Right."

name: Deadly Blessing
summary_text: After her husband dies under mysterious circumstances, a widow becomes increasingly paranoid of the neighboring religious community that may have diabolical plans for her.

name: The Corpse of Anna Fritz
summary_text: Anna Fritz, a famous and beautiful actress, has died recently. Three young men sneak into the morgue to see her naked, fascinated by her beauty.

name: Alone
summary_text: Deceased Siamese twin returns to haunt surviving sister

summary_text: An actor limited to stereotypical roles because of his ethnicity, dreams of making it big as a highly respected performer. As he makes his rounds, the film takes a satiric look at African American actors in Hollywood.

name: Fack ju Göhte 3

name: Heaven's Prisoners

summary_text: How the pursuit of an Indian cricket legend's Ferrari makes a young boy's dreams of playing cricket at Lords a reality.

In 1944 Estonia, a fratricide war ensues when Estonians of the retreating German forces fight against Estonians conscripted into the advancing Soviet Red Army.

summary_text: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

name: Demonlover
summary_text: A French corporation goes head-to-head with an American web media company for the rights to a 3-D manga pornography studio, resulting in a power struggle that culminates in violence and espionage.

name: Baekmanjangja-ui cheot-sarang
summary_text: Jae-Kyung (Hyun-Bin ) is a tough guy, who is a high school senior,If he turns 19 years means, he could be a millionaire by inheriting his deceased grandfather's wealth. Unfortunately his ...                See full summary »

name: Kaal
summary_text: A tiger expert, his wife, two tourists and a village chief engage in a battle for survival against supernatural beasts within Jim Corbett National Wildlife Park.

name: Flesh and Bone
summary_text: Decades later, a son of a killer falls in love with a girl, whose family's horrifying murder he saw in childhood.

name: Bud Abbott and Lou Costello Meet the Invisible Man
summary_text: Two bumbling private eyes help a man wrongly accused of murder who has become invisible to help clear his name.

name: B*A*P*S
summary_text: Two tacky homegirls move to L.A. to become dancers; instead they scam a dying millionaire but eventually become B*A*P*S (Black American Princesses).

name: The Devil's Brigade
summary_text: A US Army Colonel is tasked with forming an elite commando-style unit from crack Canadian troops and the dregs of the US Army.

name: Freaks: You're One of Us
summary_text: Tipped by a mysterious tramp, a meek fry cook discovers she has superpowers -- and uncovers an unsavory, vast conspiracy.

name: La faute à Fidel!
summary_text: A 9-year-old girl weathers big changes in her household as her parents become radical political activists in 1970-71 Paris.

name: The Woman in Black
summary_text: A lawyer travels to a small seaside town to settle the estate of a recently deceased woman, but soon becomes ensnared in something much more sinister.

name: C/o Kancharapalem
summary_text: Four unconventional love stories set in the town and including the people of Kancherapalem.

name: Confetti
summary_text: A mockumentary that follows three couples as they battle it out to win the coveted title of 'Most Original Wedding of the Year'.

name: Celine and Julie Go Boating
summary_text: A mysteriously linked pair of young women find their daily lives preempted by a strange boudoir melodrama that plays itself out in a hallucinatory parallel reality.

name: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
summary_text: A team of spies is sent into Incheon to gain intelligence on North Korean positions ahead of the invasion by UN forces.

name: Tashan
summary_text: What happens when you throw 2 guys who hate each other together? Add for good measure a beauty and a gangster and the trouble is no one can be trusted.

name: Pudhu Pettai
summary_text: After running away from his home Kumar falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the Criminal Underworld.

name: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
summary_text: An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.

name: Dil
summary_text: A man pretends to be a rich industrialist to improve his son's chances of marrying in to wealth, but his plan backfires on him.

name: The Thrill of It All
summary_text: A housewife's sudden rise to fame as a soap spokesperson leads to chaos in her home life.

name: Trigun: Badlands Rumble
summary_text: A gunfighter with a strict no-kill policy, Vash the Stampede arrives in a town full of bounty hunters competing to collect the reward for catching a robber he saved 20 years ago.

name: Lola Montès
summary_text: When she is reduced to appearing in a circus, a notorious beauty thinks back on her past loves.

name: Life in a Year
summary_text: The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.

name: Mutant Action
summary_text: In a future ruled by attractive people, mutant terrorists kidnap a rich man's daughter to claim rights for the ugly. Escaping police, the mutant leader crashes into a planet of crazy miners where no women live.

name: The Rapture
summary_text: A telephone operator living an empty, amoral life finds God and loses him again.

name: Spetters
summary_text: Several Dutch teenagers realize cruel difference between dreams and reality.

name: The Flamingo Kid
summary_text: A recent high school graduate unsure of his future gets a summer job at the Flamingo beach club, and meets the charismatic Phil Brody.

name: Pelísky
summary_text: Two families, Sebkovi and Krausovi, are celebrating christmas, but not everyone is in a good mood. Teenage kids think their fathers are totaly stupid, fathers are sure their children are ...                See full summary »

name: America America
summary_text: A young Greek stops at nothing to secure a passage to America.

name: Goodbye First Love
summary_text: A chronicle of the romance between Camille and Sullivan, which begins during their adolescence and picks up after Sullivan's 8-year absence from exploring the world.

name: Force 2
summary_text: ACP Yashvardhan teams up with RAW Agent KK to bring down the mole within RAW.

name: Virumandi
summary_text: A temperamental farmer gets embroiled in a bloody clan feud in a southern Tamil Nadu village.

name: Desperate Living
summary_text: A neurotic society woman murders her husband with the help of her maid and, on the lam, escape to Mortville, a homeless community ruled over by a fascist queen.

name: Deiva Thirumagal
summary_text: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

name: Cheeni Kum
summary_text: An egotistical 64-year-old chef and confirmed bachelor falls for a woman 30 years his junior.

name: Epidemic
summary_text: A director and screenwriter pen a script and, in the process, blur the line between fiction and reality.

name: 13 Cameras
summary_text: A newlywed couple, move into a new house across the country, only to find out that their marital issues are the least of their problems. Unbeknownst to them, their grim and lascivious landlord has been spying on them from day one.

name: Bill Burr: Let It Go
summary_text: Stand-up comedian Bill Burr's 2010 comedy special.

name: The Moustache
summary_text: Marc is sitting in his bath one morning and asks his wife, "how would you feel if I shaved off my mustache?" She doesn't think it's a great idea, for the 15 years they've been married, ...                See full summary »

name: Invader ZIM: Enter the Florpus
summary_text: ZIM discovers his almighty leaders never had any intention of coming to Earth and he loses confidence in himself for the first time in his life, which is the big break his human nemesis, Dib has been waiting for.

name: Hell's Angels
summary_text: Brothers Monte and Ray leave Oxford to join the Royal Flying Corps. Ray loves Helen; Helen enjoys an affair with Monte; before they leave on their mission over Germany they find her in still another man's arms.

name: Our Man in Havana
summary_text: Jim Wormold, who is a vacuum cleaner salesman, participates as an Agent in the British Secret Service. But he soon realizes that his plans by lying are going to get him into trouble.

name: Realive
summary_text: Marc will die of cancer and chooses cryogenic freeze and hopes to be thawed, when there's a solution to his condition. He's the first human brought back 68 years later. Can he adapt mentally and physically?

name: Welcome Home, Roxy Carmichael
summary_text: A small town prepares for the homecoming of superstar Roxy Carmichael, as does a young outsider, who believes Roxy is her mother.

name: The Bible: In the Beginning...
summary_text: Extravagant production of the first part of the book of Genesis. Its main highlights are the Garden of Eden, the first brothers, Noah and his family obeying God to build an ark for the Flood and Abraham's attempted sacrifice of Isaac.

name: Dead Ringer
summary_text: The working-class twin sister of a callous, wealthy woman impulsively murders her out of revenge and assumes her identity. But impersonating her dead twin is more complicated and risky than she anticipated.

name: Chashme Baddoor
summary_text: When pretty new neighbor Seema falls for their shy roommate Sid, jealous womanizers Omi and Jai plot to break up the new lovebirds.

name: The Last Broadcast
summary_text: A film crew ventures into the forest in search of the mythical 'Jersey Devil'.

name: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
summary_text: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

name: Repli-Kate
summary_text: A scientist and his sidekick accidentally clone a journalist and decide to turn the mistake into Repli-Kate, their idea of the perfect woman, who loves, beer, football and frat parties.

name: Last of the Dogmen
summary_text: A Montana bounty hunter and an anthropologist discover a tribe of Native Americans living in a settlement isolated from the rest of the world.

name: Murphy's Law
summary_text: An action-packed thriller starring Charles Bronson as Jack Murphy, a cop who is running to stay alive long enough to even the score with his wife's killer.

name: Dust Devil
summary_text: A woman on the run from her abusive husband encounters a mysterious hitch-hiker.

name: The King of Marvin Gardens
summary_text: A daydreamer convinces his radio personality brother to help fund one of his get-rich-quick schemes.

name: La prima cosa bella
summary_text: A misanthropic professor returns to his hometown to assist his dying mother.

name: The Tiger
summary_text: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger.

name: The Wonders
summary_text: A family of beekeepers living in the Tuscan countryside finds their household disrupted by the simultaneous arrival of a silently troubled teenage boy and a reality TV show intent on showcasing the family.

name: Television
summary_text: As a leader of the local community, Chairman Amin bans every kind of image in his water-locked village in rural Bangladesh. He even goes on to claim that imagination is also sinful since it...                See full summary »

name: La Ronde
summary_text: Vignettes revolving around a circle of interconnected love.

name: The Unbelievable Truth
summary_text: A man returns to his home town after serving a prison sentence for homicide, and finds that the details of the crime have been forgotten and replaced with local legends and rumors.

name: Darbar
summary_text: A police officer is on a chase to hunt down a dreaded gangster to fulfill his own secret agenda.

name: Un bonheur n'arrive jamais seul
summary_text: Sacha Keller is only interested in one night stands with 20-somethings and has a phobia of children. That is until he meets Charlotte, the divorced mother-of-three and ex-wife of one his employer's powerful clients.

name: The List of Adrian Messenger
summary_text: A former intelligence officer is tasked by the heir to the Gleneyre estate to investigate the unusual deaths of a disparate group of eleven men on a list.

name: Dying to Survive
summary_text: A story on how a small drug store owner became the exclusive selling agent of a cheap Indian generic drug against Chronic Granulocytic Leukemia in China.

name: Books of Blood
summary_text: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

name: The Little Drummer Boy
summary_text: An orphan drummer boy who hated humanity finds his life changed forever when he meets three wise men on route to Bethlehem.

name: The Lower Depths
summary_text: In a Japanese slum, various residents play out their lives, dreaming of better things or settling for their lot. Among them is a man who pines for a young woman but is stymied by her deceptive family.

name: Bhoothnath Returns
summary_text: A ghost returns back from his world to prove something. But on earth, he has something more to do for his country.

name: Pathfinder
summary_text: A Warband intent on slaughter terrorizes northern Scandinavian villages in 1000 AD.

name: Death Tunnel
summary_text: For an initiation stunt, five college women are locked in a Kentucky hospital built in 1910 where 63,000 people died from a disease known as the "white plague". Deep under the hospital is the "Death Tunnel" which once were used to secretly remove the dead from the grounds.

name: The Saragossa Manuscript
summary_text: Upon finding a book that relates his grandfather's story, an officer ventures through Spain meeting a wide array of characters, most of whom have a story of their own to tell.

name: Mother Night
summary_text: An American spy behind the lines during WWII serves as a Nazi propagandist, a role he cannot escape in his future life as he can never reveal his real role in the war.
Exactly 100 years after the Armenian Genocide, a theatre director stages a play to bring the ghosts of the past back to life.

name: Steven Universe: The Movie
summary_text: Steven thinks his time defending the Earth is over, but when a new threat comes to Beach City, Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.

name: Son of the Pink Panther
summary_text: Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.

name: American Ninja 3: Blood Hunt
summary_text: An expert fighter leads an assault on the island lab of a madman making a virus for terrorists.

name: Come Back to Me
summary_text: Sarah and Josh are married suburbanites. After a car accident, Sarah suffers blackouts. As her life spirals she hides a camera in her home and unlocks a horrific secret with far-reaching consequences.

name: Ejder Kapani
summary_text: When a serial killer goes after former convicted pedophiles, it is up to Police Commissioner Abbas and his Chief Celal to stop the killings.

name: Twins of Evil
summary_text: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

name: To Hell and Back
summary_text: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.
